name: Gods of all people: I sacrificed hundreds of millions of living beings to become a god
author: 触手漫画工作室
content: Han Wu transmigrated to a world where everyone can become a god. He obtained the ability to sacrifice life.At the beginning, he had a trash clan, so he sacrificed to change his fate against the heavens.With no power, no status, and no money, he sacrificed his way to the top.As long as he has enough followers, he can become infinitely stronger through sacrifice, becoming the main god, the god of gods!
